text: i've loved technology ever since i was
young
growing up in india my first memory was
visiting my uncle's office which was
full of computers
we had to take our shoes off at the door
to keep all the dust out
in my career i've worked in technical
design virtualization vmware hypervisors
and sound storage
i always wanted to work for aws so it
was a dream come true when i was offered
the role
today i'm a cloud infrastructure
architect and professional services team
assisting customers on their cloud
adoption and transformation journey
i ensure the architecture is resilient
available
scalable while simultaneously focusing
on the primary objective of helping them
achieve their business outcome to thrive
as a cloud architect from a technical
perspective
you need a solid understanding of cloud
computing fundamentals
most of all you need to be forever
curious about the technology the
innovation and
be a builder at heart outside of my
day-to-day job
i'm part of the grow initiative which
stands for getting real outcome for
women
which is run by women at posa it's a
multi-dimensional women's leadership
development program
what attracted me to aws was the amazon
leadership principles
they really resonated and to this day
it's amazing to see how everyone from
top to bottom
follows them to a team if you've got a
kanju attitude
and a passion for learning and
innovating aws is a place full of highly
talented
humble and helpful people to build with
